Description.Text: The Royal Hotel is a 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation, friendly and welcoming service and a pleasant location in Bridge of Allan, approximately 5km from the centre of historic Stirling. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an extensive range of dining opportunities. The hotel is located approximately 5km from Stirling centre in the quaint Bridge of Allen. Nearby places of interest include Stirling Castle, the Falkirk Wheel and the National Wallace Monument. The hotel occupies a traditional-style manor house. There are no leisure facilities onsite but free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. There are also numerous opportunities for leisure activities in the surrounding area. Standard rooms are well equipped & comfortably furnished with en-suite bathrooms and one double bed. Amenities include Free Wi-Fi, a telephone, TV and radio. Dining opportunities include the Windows restaurant which serves a variety of creative dishes using a fine range of fresh local and seasonal produce. Additionally, The Kings Bar is the perfect place to unwind after a hard day exploring Bridge of Allan and Stirling, with great food and a good range of beverages on offer. Parking is possible onsite.
